column4: I went there, but there is now where to change that. All I have there is the listing of the chosen one by the system which is: 800 X 600, 1024 X 768. I cannot change it from there.
If you know what you're doing, I guess you can change your resolutions directly from xorg.conf...
I got late here, so, tell me exactly what you need. As bruenig said, if your new and you're not really sure of what you'll be doing, well...
So it works perfectly on KDE?
